lexUnit.definition: COD: come to a resolution in the mind as a result of consideration

sentence.text: His well-being is of even higher importance to Scotland now that Peter Dods , such an admirable understudy with 23 caps , had decided to call it a day .
There was an investigation and we decided to take the records off sale altogether . "
Frances explains : ` I decided to go into special education two years after I qualified as a teacher .
By this time she had decided that I was utterly irresponsible ( in spite of my record toast-making ) , and she said that I should wear warmer clothes .
A judge decided that the poster advertising the film was much too close to the one used for the original Cleopatra .
Have a look and decide if there are any that seem to go together .
It was decided that such an application was incompetent .
Having decided that you are satisfied with the picture , it is then time to tackle an essential , but also rather tedious , part of pressed flower work -- framing and finishing .
It was decided that he would take me in as an apprentice to old Bill ( Mr Carswell ) .
Let's go and decide where not to go for lunch . "
Had he decided to take Didi Lombard 's advice ?
Even before the blazer , I had very reluctantly decided that the time had come to visit my doctor .
So instead he decided to climb Everest .
The man paused , then magnanimously decided to give the benefit of his expertise , ` What you want to do is chop ten minutes out of it .
In the Supreme Court the guilt or innocence of the accused was decided not by the judge but the jury .
How that responsibility is best discharged can be decided only by the person concerned .
The fee will be decided by an independent tribunal .
Everyone decided at the same time that they ought to go home , and a mass exodus of tourists , day visitors and the York people themselves began , snarling up the place generally .
This year we decided at the AGM to visit the Llangollen Railway , having learnt from the railway press that it has made rapid progress in the last three years .
Disagreement over a course of policy action led to several contradictory published reports whether or not Iran decided to pursue a CW program .
In 1945 , the twenty - seven - year - old Anwar al-Sadat and his friends decided to assassinate the on - and - off prime minister of Egypt , Nahhas Pasha .
This was decided at the two - day meeting of the India - US Joint Working Group on Counterterrorim , which ended today .

The two countries decided to advance cooperation in the areas of bioterrorism , aviation security , biometrics , cyber - security and terrorism , WMD - terrorism , terrorist finance and money laundering and violent extremism , a release issued by the Embassy of India said .
Having worked as a nurse , she decided to throw the personnel a few curves .
There is the point which we still have to decide .
I could n't decide if I should come home to Marin , because my house is on stilts .
I decided to brave the storm .
